评论详情: I ordered for my son. He picked the brown color. The suit is nice quality but they sent the champagne and not the brown. I reached out to customer service and never heard anything back. My son said he'll keep it but he still wants the brown, I'll be ordering from someone else.

When I purchased these suits I was concerned with how they would fit based upon how I sized them solely on their ages. To my surprise they were perfect. This is my 7 year old and it fits great, thankful for the adjustable waist band too! We searched high and low for good quality suits for our upcoming wedding for our boys and finally we found all three here. Highly recommend.
This is actually the second one I have purchased. One for a wedding and one for other formal. My son loved it so much and may become a Halloween outfit too!!
Handsome Suit. Great price and the quality beyond what I hoped for when ordering online. My son says the suit is comfortable and the fabric is outstanding!
